content: needle 1 pick up and knit 2 additional sts at top of gusset to avoid gusset hole place marker work 15 sts in established pattern needle 2 work rest of instep sts in established pattern place marker pick up and knit 2 additional sts at top of gusset as before knit 16 sts from side of heel flap knit 9 sts from needle 1 now each of the needles holds either the left or right half of the foot needle 1 heel - 43 sts needle 2 instep - 42 sts gusset decreases dpns round 1 needle 1 knit to last 2 sts ssk needle 2 work in est pattern needle 3 k2tog knit to end of needle round 2 needle 1 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 work in est chili pepper pattern needle 3 k1 ssk knit to end of needle round 3 needle 1 knit needle 2 work in est chili pepper pattern needle 3 knit repeat rnds 2 and 3 until 65 sts remain on following round decrease only 1 st instead of 2 sts as follows needle 1 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 work in est chili pepper pattern needle 3 knit needle 1 17 sts needle 2 30 sts needle 3 17 sts magic loop round 1 needle 1 knit to 2 sts before marker ssk slip marker work in est chili pepper pattern needle 2 work in est chili pepper pattern to marker slip marker k2tog knit to end of needle round 2 needle 1 knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 slip marker work in est chili pepper pattern needle 2 work in est chili pepper pattern to marker slip marker k1 ssk knit to end of needle round 3 needle 1 knit to marker slip marker work in est chili pepper pattern needle 2 work in est chili pepper pattern to marker slip marker knit to end of needle repeat rnds 2 and 3 until 65 sts remain on following round decrease only 1 st instead of 2 sts as follows needle 1 knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 slip marker work in est chili pepper pattern needle 2 work in est chili pepper pattern to marker slip marker knit to end needle 1 32 sts needle 2 32 sts foot knit in pattern until the foot measures 2 5 less than desired total length toe shaping decrease round 1 *k6 k2tog repeat from* 56 sts knit 6 row decrease round 2 *k5 k2tog repeat from* __48 sts remain knit 5 row decrease round 3 *k4 k2tog repeat from * __40 sts remain knit 4 row decrease round 4 *k3 k2tog repeat from* __ 32 sts remain knit 3 row decrease round 5 *k2 k2tog repeat from* __24 sts remain knit 2 row decrease round 6 *k1 k2tog repeat from* __16 sts remain knit 1 row decrease round 7 *k2 decrease repeat from * __ 8 sts remain cut yarn and
